file.name: azure.com-recoveryservicesbackup-bms-2016-12-01-swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: RecoveryServicesBackupClient
  version: 2016-12-01
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - cloud
  x-logo:
    url: https://assets.onestore.ms/cdnfiles/onestorerolling-1606-01000/shell/v3/images/logo/microsoft.png
  x-origin:
    - format: swagger
      url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/azure-rest-api-specs/master/specification/recoveryservicesbackup/resource-manager/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/stable/2016-12-01/bms.json
      version: "2.0"
  x-preferred: false
  x-providerName: azure.com
  x-serviceName: recoveryservicesbackup-bms
  x-tags:
    - Azure
    - Microsoft
security:
  - azure_auth:
      - user_impersonation
paths:
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupEngines":
    get:
      description: Backup management servers registered to Recovery Services Vault. Returns
        a pageable list of servers.
      operationId: BackupEngines_List
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: OData filter options.
          in: query
          name: $filter
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: skipToken Filter.
          in: query
          name: $skipToken
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BackupEngineBaseResourceList"
              examples:
                List Dpm/AzureBackupServer/Lajolla Backup Engines:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/List_Dpm_AzureBackupServer_Lajolla_B\
                    ackup_Engines"
      tags:
        - BackupEngines
      x-ms-odata: "#/components/schemas/BMSBackupEnginesQueryObject"
      x-ms-pageable:
        nextLinkName: nextLink
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupEngines/{backupEngineName}":
    get:
      description: Returns backup management server registered to Recovery Services Vault.
      operationId: BackupEngines_Get
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Name of the backup management server.
          in: path
          name: backupEngineName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Dpm/AzureBackupServer/Lajolla Backup Engine Details:
              value: testServer
        - description: OData filter options.
          in: query
          name: $filter
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - description: skipToken Filter.
          in: query
          name: $skipToken
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/BackupEngineBaseResource"
              examples:
                Get Dpm/AzureBackupServer/Lajolla Backup Engine Details:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Get_Dpm_AzureBackupServer_Lajolla_Ba\
                    ckup_Engine_Details"
      tags:
        - BackupEngines
      x-ms-odata: "#/components/schemas/BMSBackupEngineQueryObject"
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/operationResults/{operationId}":
    get:
      description: Provides the result of the refresh operation triggered by the
        BeginRefresh operation.
      operationId: ProtectionContainerRefreshOperationResults_Get
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the container.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Azure Vm Discovery Operation Result:
              value: Azure
        - description: Operation ID associated with the operation whose result needs to be
            fetched.
          in: path
          name: operationId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Azure Vm Discovery Operation Result:
              value: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
        "204":
          description: NoContent
      tags:
        - ProtectionContainerRefreshOperationResults
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectableContainers":
    get:
      description: Lists the containers that can be registered to Recovery Services Vault.
      operationId: ProtectableContainers_List
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List protectable items with backupManagementType filter as AzureStorage:
              value: Azure
        - description: OData filter options.
          in: query
          name: $filter
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List protectable items with backupManagementType filter as AzureStorage:
              value: backupManagementType eq 'AzureStorage' and workloadType eq
                'AzureFileShare'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProtectableContainerResourceList"
              examples:
                List protectable items with backupManagementType filter as AzureStorage:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/List_protectable_items_with_backupMa\
                    nagementType_filter_as_AzureStorage"
      tags:
        - ProtectableContainers
      x-ms-odata: "#/components/schemas/BMSContainerQueryObject"
      x-ms-pageable:
        nextLinkName: nextLink
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectionContainers/{containerName}":
    delete:
      description: "Unregisters the given container from your Recovery Services Vault. This
        is an asynchronous operation. To determine\r

        whether the backend service has finished processing the request,
        call Get Container Operation Result API."
      operationId: ProtectionContainers_Unregister
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Name of the fabric where the container belongs.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Unregister Protection Container:
              value: Azure
        - description: Name of the container which needs to be unregistered from the
            Recovery Services Vault.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Unregister Protection Container:
              value: storagecontainer;Storage;test-rg;teststorage
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
        "204":
          description: NoContent
      tags:
        - ProtectionContainers
    get:
      description: Gets details of the specific container registered to your Recovery
        Services Vault.
      operationId: ProtectionContainers_Get
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Name of the fabric where the container belongs.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Protection Container Details:
              value: Azure
        - description: Name of the container whose details need to be fetched.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Protection Container Details:
              value: VMAppContainer;Compute;testRG;testSQL
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProtectionContainerResource"
              examples:
                Get Protection Container Details:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Get_Protection_Container_Details"
      tags:
        - ProtectionContainers
    put:
      description: "Registers the container with Recovery Services vault.\r

        This is an asynchronous operation. To track the operation
        status, use location header to call get latest status of\r

        the operation."
      operationId: ProtectionContainers_Register
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the container.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            RegisterAzure Storage ProtectionContainers:
              value: Azure
        - description: Name of the container to be registered.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            RegisterAzure Storage ProtectionContainers:
              value: VMAppContainer;Compute;testRG;testSQL
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProtectionContainerResource"
        description: Request body for operation
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProtectionContainerResource"
              examples:
                RegisterAzure Storage ProtectionContainers:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/RegisterAzure_Storage_ProtectionCont\
                    ainers"
        "202":
          description: Accepted
      tags:
        - ProtectionContainers
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectionContainers/{containerName}/inquire":
    post:
      description: This is an async operation and the results should be tracked using
        location header or Azure-async-url.
      operationId: ProtectionContainers_Inquire
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric Name associated with the container.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Inquire Azure Storage Protection Containers:
              value: Azure
        - description: Name of the container in which inquiry needs to be triggered.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Inquire Azure Storage Protection Containers:
              value: storagecontainer;Storage;test-rg;teststorage
        - description: OData filter options.
          in: query
          name: $filter
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
      summary: Inquires all the protectable items under the given container.
      tags:
        - ProtectionContainers
      x-ms-odata: "#/components/schemas/BMSContainersInquiryQueryObject"
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectionContainers/{containerName}/items":
    get:
      description: "Provides a pageable list of workload item of a specific container
        according to the query filter and the pagination\r

        parameters."
      operationId: BackupWorkloadItems_List
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the container.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List Workload Items in Container:
              value: Azure
        - description: Name of the container.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List Workload Items in Container:
              value: VMAppContainer;Compute;bvtdtestag;sqlserver-1
        - description: OData filter options.
          in: query
          name: $filter
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            List Workload Items in Container:
              value: backupManagementType eq 'AzureWorkload'
        - description: skipToken Filter.
          in: query
          name: $skipToken
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/WorkloadItemResourceList"
              examples:
                List Workload Items in Container:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/List_Workload_Items_in_Container"
      tags:
        - BackupWorkloadItems
      x-ms-odata: "#/components/schemas/BMSWorkloadItemQueryObject"
      x-ms-pageable:
        nextLinkName: nextLink
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectionContainers/{containerName}/operationResults/{operationId}":
    get:
      description: Fetches the result of any operation on the container.
      operationId: ProtectionContainerOperationResults_Get
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the container.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Azure Storage Protection Container Operation Result:
              value: Azure
        - description: Container name whose information should be fetched.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Azure Storage Protection Container Operation Result:
              value: VMAppContainer;Compute;testRG;testSQL
        - description: Operation ID which represents the operation whose result needs to be
            fetched.
          in: path
          name: operationId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Azure Storage Protection Container Operation Result:
              value: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProtectionContainerResource"
              examples:
                Get Azure Storage Protection Container Operation Result:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Get_Azure_Storage_Protection_Contain\
                    er_Operation_Result"
        "202":
          description: Accepted
        "204":
          description: NoContent
      tags:
        - ProtectionContainerOperationResults
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectionContainers/{containerName}/protectedItems/{protectedItemName}":
    delete:
      description: "Used to disable backup of an item within a container. This is an
        asynchronous operation. To know the status of the\r

        request, call the GetItemOperationResult API."
      operationId: ProtectedItems_Delete
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the backed up item.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete Protection from Azure Virtual Machine:
              value: Azure
        - description: Container name associated with the backed up item.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete Protection from Azure Virtual Machine:
              value: iaasvmcontainer;iaasvmcontainerv2;pysdktestrg;pysdktestv2vm1
        - description: Backed up item to be deleted.
          in: path
          name: protectedItemName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Delete Protection from Azure Virtual Machine:
              value: vm;iaasvmcontainerv2;pysdktestrg;pysdktestv2vm1
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
        "204":
          description: NoContent
      tags:
        - ProtectedItems
    get:
      description: "Provides the details of the backed up item. This is an asynchronous
        operation. To know the status of the operation,\r

        call the GetItemOperationResult API."
      operationId: ProtectedItems_Get
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the backed up item.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Protected Classic Virtual Machine Details:
              value: Azure
            Get Protected Virtual Machine Details:
              value: Azure
        - description: Container name associated with the backed up item.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Protected Classic Virtual Machine Details:
              value: iaasvmcontainer;iaasvmcontainer;iaasvm-rg;iaasvm-1
            Get Protected Virtual Machine Details:
              value: iaasvmcontainer;iaasvmcontainerv2;iaasvm-rg;iaasvm-1
        - description: Backed up item name whose details are to be fetched.
          in: path
          name: protectedItemName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Protected Classic Virtual Machine Details:
              value: vm;iaasvmcontainer;iaasvm-rg;iaasvm-1
            Get Protected Virtual Machine Details:
              value: vm;iaasvmcontainerv2;iaasvm-rg;iaasvm-1
        - description: OData filter options.
          in: query
          name: $filter
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProtectedItemResource"
              examples:
                Get Protected Classic Virtual Machine Details:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Get_Protected_Classic_Virtual_Machin\
                    e_Details"
                Get Protected Virtual Machine Details:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Get_Protected_Virtual_Machine_Details"
      tags:
        - ProtectedItems
      x-ms-odata: "#/components/schemas/GetProtectedItemQueryObject"
    put:
      description: "Enables backup of an item or to modifies the backup policy information
        of an already backed up item. This is an\r

        asynchronous operation. To know the status of the operation,
        call the GetItemOperationResult API."
      operationId: ProtectedItems_CreateOrUpdate
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the backup item.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Enable Protection on Azure IaasVm:
              value: Azure
            Stop Protection with retain data on Azure IaasVm:
              value: Azure
        - description: Container name associated with the backup item.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Enable Protection on Azure IaasVm:
              value: IaasVMContainer;iaasvmcontainerv2;netsdktestrg;netvmtestv2vm1
            Stop Protection with retain data on Azure IaasVm:
              value: IaasVMContainer;iaasvmcontainerv2;netsdktestrg;netvmtestv2vm1
        - description: Item name to be backed up.
          in: path
          name: protectedItemName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Enable Protection on Azure IaasVm:
              value: VM;iaasvmcontainerv2;netsdktestrg;netvmtestv2vm1
            Stop Protection with retain data on Azure IaasVm:
              value: VM;iaasvmcontainerv2;netsdktestrg;netvmtestv2vm1
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProtectedItemResource"
        description: resource backed up item
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProtectedItemResource"
              examples:
                Enable Protection on Azure IaasVm:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Enable_Protection_on_Azure_IaasVm"
                Stop Protection with retain data on Azure IaasVm:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Stop_Protection_with_retain_data_on_\
                    Azure_IaasVm"
        "202":
          description: Accepted
      tags:
        - ProtectedItems
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectionContainers/{containerName}/protectedItems/{protectedItemName}/backup":
    post:
      description: "Triggers backup for specified backed up item. This is an asynchronous
        operation. To know the status of the\r

        operation, call GetProtectedItemOperationResult API."
      operationId: Backups_Trigger
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the backup item.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Trigger Backup:
              value: Azure
        - description: Container name associated with the backup item.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Trigger Backup:
              value: IaasVMContainer;iaasvmcontainerv2;testrg;v1win2012r
        - description: Backup item for which backup needs to be triggered.
          in: path
          name: protectedItemName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Trigger Backup:
              value: VM;iaasvmcontainerv2;testrg;v1win2012r
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/BackupRequestResource"
        description: resource backup request
        required: true
      responses:
        "202":
          description: Accepted
      tags:
        - Backups
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectionContainers/{containerName}/protectedItems/{protectedItemName}/operationResults/{operationId}":
    get:
      description: Fetches the result of any operation on the backup item.
      operationId: ProtectedItemOperationResults_Get
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the backup item.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Operation Results of Protected Vm:
              value: Azure
        - description: Container name associated with the backup item.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Operation Results of Protected Vm:
              value: IaasVMContainer;iaasvmcontainerv2;netsdktestrg;netvmtestv2vm1
        - description: Backup item name whose details are to be fetched.
          in: path
          name: protectedItemName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Operation Results of Protected Vm:
              value: VM;iaasvmcontainerv2;netsdktestrg;netvmtestv2vm1
        - description: OperationID which represents the operation whose result needs to be
            fetched.
          in: path
          name: operationId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Operation Results of Protected Vm:
              value: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ProtectedItemResource"
              examples:
                Get Operation Results of Protected Vm:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Get_Operation_Results_of_Protected_Vm"
        "202":
          description: Accepted
        "204":
          description: NoContent
      tags:
        - ProtectedItemOperationResults
  "/Subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.RecoveryServices/vaults/{vaultName}/backupFabrics/{fabricName}/protectionContainers/{containerName}/protectedItems/{protectedItemName}/operationsStatus/{operationId}":
    get:
      description: "Fetches the status of an operation such as triggering a backup,
        restore. The status can be in progress, completed\r

        or failed. You can refer to the OperationStatus enum for all the
        possible states of the operation. Some operations\r

        create jobs. This method returns the list of jobs associated
        with the operation."
      operationId: ProtectedItemOperationStatuses_Get
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersion"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/VaultName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ResourceGroupName"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionId"
        - description: Fabric name associated with the backup item.
          in: path
          name: fabricName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Operation Status of Protected Vm:
              value: Azure
        - description: Container name associated with the backup item.
          in: path
          name: containerName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            Get Operation Status of Protected Vm:
              value: IaasVMContainer;iaasvmcontainerv2;netsdktestrg;netvmtestv2vm1
        - description: Backup item name whose details are to be fetched.
          in: path
          name: protectedItemName
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
